health_tech: FHIR Protocol for Health Data Exchange

evidence.claim: MentalHappy utilizes AWS Lambda for serverless computing, enhancing scalability and reducing costs.
The platform is designed to be HIPAA compliant, ensuring secure transmission of health data.
MentalHappy integrates with healthcare systems using FHIR standards for data interchange.
Use of AWS services (like S3) for data storage and management is evident in their technical documentation.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of engaging in relevant X12 transactions or clearinghouse activities.
